text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem biopsy-result-observation-code-system

This code system http://cancerscreeningcds.github.io/bcsm-cds/CodeSystem/biopsy-result-observation-code-system defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
Negative Normal breast tissue
Benign Benign breast findingBenign findings, excluding ADH, LCIS or ALH
Atypical Atypical breast findingIncludes atypical ductal hyperplasia (ADH) and lobular neoplasia (lobular carcinoma in situ [LCIS]/atypical lobular hyperplasia [ALH]
Malignant Malignant breast findingInvasive or non-invasive breast malignancy
Indeterminate Indeterminate breast finding
Discordant Discordant breast finding

name: BiopsyResultObservationCodeSystem
title: Biopsy Result Observation Code System
description: Code representing breast cancer biopsy result observations

concept.definition: Benign findings, excluding ADH, LCIS or ALH
Includes atypical ductal hyperplasia (ADH) and lobular neoplasia (lobular carcinoma in situ [LCIS]/atypical lobular hyperplasia [ALH]
